ai_explanation.introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is そうおん which you will often hear in urban settings, during discussions about pollution, or when referring to disturbances caused by loud sounds.
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word "そうおん" means "noise." It's referring to any kind of disruptive or unwanted sound that disturbs the peace or quiet in an environment.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

examples.furigana: 騒音(そうおん)公害(こうがい)は問題(もんだい)です。

examples.furigana: 騒音(そうおん)問題(もんだい)は大変(たいへん)です。

synonyms: 雑音 : ざつおん : noise
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym of the word "そうおん" is "ざつおん." While "そうおん" refers broadly to any disruptive or loud noise, "ざつおん" specifically denotes background noise composed of various overlapping sounds.
antonyms: 静寂 : せいじゃく : silence
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of the word "そうおん" is "せいじゃく," which means "silence" or "quietness." While "そうおん" indicates disruption through noise, "せいじゃく" refers to an absence of sound, promoting calm and peace.
